title: OTA config
description: Over the Air config. All timing and temperature threshold values should be configurable over the air (eg. by downloading a current well known name config file (JSON) from the same S3 location where the pictures are uploaded. This should control the values for dht read interval, photo hourly interval, etc (basically all the various defines at top of the file, including the 24 hours tem table value). succesful read of this config should also store the values in NVM so that it works if WIFI fails. Only read the values once. Do not initiate WIFI explictly for reading this value, but do read them at first succesful WIFI connect
